sections.title: New
items: Added Ranked mode with visible MMR and seasonal resets
New competitive leaderboard that updates automatically
New map: Rustyard (industrial setting with tight corridors)
Added end-of-round performance breakdown
New lobby ambience and placeholder music track
Players can now preview other playersâ€™ loadouts in lobby
Added in-game update log viewer (this UI)
FS will not be available until the next update
Experimental matchmaking enabled on a subset of servers
Warmup phase added before rounds begin

sections.title: Fixes
items: Fixed shop UI opening multiple times when clicked rapidly
Resolved UI duplication when respawning
Fixed lag spikes caused by excessive Tween creation
Patched memory leaks from uncleaned RBXScriptConnections
Fixed players clipping through doors in rare cases
Fixed hit detection inconsistencies on sloped surfaces
Resolved animation desync when joining mid-round
Fixed leaderboard not refreshing after match end
Patched server errors caused by nil humanoids
Resolved rare crash during large map loads

sections.title: Changes
items: Adjusted default movement speed for consistency
Rebalanced stamina drain to discourage infinite sprinting
Reduced round start delay from 10 seconds to 6 seconds
Improved server cleanup intervals for better performance
Updated UI spacing and font scaling
Improved camera smoothing while spectating
Reworked interaction prompts for faster response
Adjusted audio levels to reduce distortion
Minor FOV adjustment to reduce motion sickness

sections.title: Known Issues
items: Some cosmetics may not load correctly on first join
Occasional delay when opening menus on low-end devices
Rare desync in high-latency servers
Spectator camera may snap briefly on transitions
Lighting flicker may occur on older GPUs
Certain animations may fail to preload
FS-related features are disabled until next major update

sections.title: Experimental
items: Testing new server-side caching system
Evaluating alternative replication strategies
Early groundwork for future mod support
Testing UI virtualization for large lists
Internal rewrite of round flow logic
Collecting performance metrics for optimization
Experimental anti-exploit checks (false positives possible)

sections.title: Developer Notes
items: This update focuses heavily on stability and infrastructure
Major content drops are planned for future updates
Ranked mode will receive frequent balance adjustments
Some systems are intentionally overbuilt for future features
Recent playtest feedback directly influenced this patch
Expect smaller but more frequent hotfixes
Thanks for testing and reporting issues
